photometry.remarks: The discovery image was taken by ten frames 300-s obtained on 2017 12 24.6842 UT with a Moravian G4-9000 KAF CCD unfiltered (limiting magnitude = 20.5), from Monte Baldo Observatory (Ferrara di Monte Baldo, Verona, Italy), with 0.4m f.8 Ritchey-Chrétien telescope.

[Last non detection] No stellar source is visible at the transient's position in our past images including reference image dated '2017-12-20T16:46:52' and  '2017-12-22T17:27:39' The  images was taken by ten frames 300-s (3000 total sec.) with a Moravian G4-9000 KAF CCD unfiltered (limiting magnitude = 20.5), from Monte Baldo Observatory (Ferrara di Monte Baldo, Verona, Italy), with 0.4m f.8 Ritchey-Chrétien telescope.
